ygData.subject: Re: Bloodclaw
ygData.msgSnippet: By the 21st level you can easily afoord a BloodClaw and he probably isn t twinked. It s really not hard to gain money you just can t gain experience then.
ygData.messageBody: By the 21st level you can easily afoord a BloodClaw and he probably isn't twinked. It's really not hard to gain money you just can't gain experience then. Actually spellcasters have it bad well priests because of the expensiveness of there spells plus every once in awhile a good spellcaster weapon comes along like Observer Staff and you get it for 1000pp whil at level 24 your spells cost around 24pp a piece. If you can't afford a BloodClaw by level 21 you need to rethink your hunting grounds.
